skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
SNOOzing just got even easier for busy parents! With the Happiest Baby SNOO skill and Alexa, you can now control your SNOO Smart Bassinet by voice. 

To use the Happiest Baby SNOO skill, first you’ll need to connect your SNOO bassinet to Wi-Fi® and pair it with your Happiest Baby Account in the Happiest Baby App (available on both iOS and Android platforms). SNOO is the default name for your device, but you can change it in your Happiest Baby App Settings.

To control your SNOO with Alexa, follow these simple steps:
Set up your Alexa device using Amazon’s Alexa App
Open the menu, go to More, then Skills & Games
Search for the “Happiest Baby SNOO” skill
Launch the skill

If you have any questions, please visit the Happiest Baby FAQ page.
